description:
Thuy Le

Abstract

Tags: devops analytics data-science python

Sport analysis with Python and visualize data with tableau. We have sample data of a team in football match (name of players, positions of players, velocities of players) which are recorded in every 20 millisecond. We use python to analysis and Tableau to visualize the activities of each player
Description     Give an example data of the IoT sport case for instance the information of football match of a team (the positions, velocities of each player with are recorded in every 20 millisecond).     We use Python to analysis and processing data (calculate the match time, analyst the activities of each player such as time in the bench, time in the pitch, ... )     We use Tableau to visualize data



Recorded at PyCon.DE 2017 Karlsruhe: pycon.de
Video editing: Sebastian Neubauer & Andrei Dan
Tools: Blender, Avidemux & Sonic Pi
title: PyCon.DE 2017 Thuy Le - Sport analysis with Python
